name: Lucky Safari
description:
Lucky Safari is my entry into the a game by its cover 2017 game jam.
More details are available here: https://itch.io/jam/a-game-by-its-cover-2017

How to play:

Move the camera lens using your mouse and take a photo with your right-mouse button. Take as many pictures of the butterflies as you can, but don't move too fast! The faster you move your camera, the more out-of-focus the photo will be and the less points you'll score!

Made by: Andy Seaboyer (@AndyMakesThings)
